articles.description: Using similar analysis to the RBA, Coolabah Capital is forecasting 25 per cent growth in house prices over the next three years.
articles.content:
So far, prices have surged 5.8 per cent in three months. National house prices jumped 2.8 per cent in March  the fastest rate of growth in 32 years.
Our expectation is that the RBA would anticipate … [+2430 chars]

articles.author: Alex Druce
articles.title: As it happened: New post-COVID peak as ASX breaks through 7000 - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The ASX200 added 0.7% on Wednesday to close at a new post-pandemic peak of 7023.1. Technology shares led gains, supported by gold miners and health stocks.
articles.content:
The Australian sharemarket broke back through 7000 points on Wednesday to reclaim its post-pandemic high, with market watchers now tipping the index to kick on to a new all-time record.
The benchmar… [+3304 chars]
